alert.note: Alert for Clay (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clay and Quitman Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 643 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Richards Crossroads, or 7 miles northwest of Fort Gaines, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Gaines, Georgetown, Days Crossroads, Wire Bridge, Walter F George Lake, Bonapartes Retreat, Standleys Store, Watson Crossroads, Moores Crossroads, Crossroads, Ricks Place, Garnersville, Bagby State Park, Hatcher and Fort Gaines-Clay Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
